metadata.title: CVE-2020-13124 on Ubuntu 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: SABnzbd 2.3.9 and 3.0.0Alpha2 has a command injection vulnerability in theweb configuration interface that permits an authenticated user to executearbitrary Python commands on the underlying operating system.

criterions.comment: sabnzbdplus package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
